title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
summary: ChatGPT, OpenAIâ€™s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to supercharge productivity through writing essays and code with short text prompts has evolved into a behemoth with 300 million weekly active users. 2024 was a big year for OpenAI, from its partnership […]
